hibernate-mapping.query: DELETE FROM TextDocText t WHERE t.docVersion = :docVersion AND t.docLanguage = :docLanguage
SELECT t FROM Text t WHERE t.i18nDocRef = :i18nDocRef
SELECT t FROM Text t WHERE t.i18nDocRef.docRef = :docRef
SELECT t FROM Text t WHERE t.i18nDocRef.docRef = :docRef AND t.no = :no
SELECT t FROM Text t WHERE t.i18nDocRef = :i18nDocRef AND t.no = :no
